string-array.name: Questions
string-array.item: Which of the following is not a name for a region in The Netherlands?
Which number is The Netherlands on the list of largest agricultural exporters of the world?
What is the average length of the Dutch male?
What is the average number of bikes per person in The Netherlands?
Which of the following cheeses is not a Dutch cheese?

resources.string: "Which of the following statements is true"?
"55% of Netherlands' territory lays below sea level"
"The Netherlands is number 5 of the largest producers of milk (worldwide)"
"77% of all flower bulbs traded worldwide come from the Netherlands"
What is the Capital of the Netherlands?
